legal_basis: s. 41(1)(d) of the Canadian Human Rights Act
decision_reasoning: complaint trivial, frivolous, vexatious, or made in bad faith
application_details: harassment/discrimination complaint after independent investigation found allegations unfounded
procedure_followed: filed complaint with Canadian Human Rights Commission, dismissed, sought judicial review, Federal Court proceedings
result_of_case: Federal Court dismissed application for judicial review, upheld Commission's decision
